channel.title: Blogs on Five Web Design
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Five Web Design

item.title: Us Vs. Website Builders
item.description: You may have heard of website builders such as Wix, GoDaddy, or SquareSpace. Why choose us over them? Well, first we should consider the cost. Wix: $204.00/yr GoDaddy: $131.88/yr (for the first year, then $155.88/yr) SquareSpace: $172.00/yr How much do we cost? We charge only $60.00/yr, including a custom domain. Note that this doesn’t include the website itself (only hosting). We will build a static website for $100.00, including custom functionality.

item.title: Now Hiring
item.description: We are now hiring! With high growth, we are seeking independent contractors to help keep up with continued demand for our websites. We will gladly pay $85.00 per static website built. Developers must know how to make a website with HTML, CSS, and JS. Knowledge of Hugo is not required but will make for a better candidate. Want to apply? Send us a demo website of your skills to EliVanV2010@hotmail.com along with your application.
